A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just terrible. I can only base that on the 3/4 that I could sit through. Only the third time I have left a theater\, the other two being Battleship and Meet The Spartans. Also both garbage. So inconsistent\, full of plot holes\, didn't go anywhere or do anything\, terrible jokes\, characters acting out of character. Just junk and I don't care to watch the end as it's finale was reported to be a toy commercial. How the mighty have fallen.
